text.text: {@multirom_backup_error1=Backup is only available if secondary ROM}
{@multirom_backup_error2=does not share the kernel with internal ROM.}
{@multirom_rename_rom_exist=A ROM with that name already exists!}
{@zip_back_cancel=Press back to cancel adding this zip.}
{@multirom_kexec_fail2=is not implemented in this version of MultiROM}
{@multirom_kexec_fail3=The no-kexec workaround is not an officially supported}
{@multirom_kexec_fail4=method. Therefore it is up to the device maintainer to}
{@multirom_kexec_fail5=decide whether to allow this functionality, as it may not}
{@multirom_kexec_fail6=function on all devices, and needs proper testing.}
{@multirom_kexec_fail7=The preferred method (and only one in this case) is}
{@multirom_kexec_fail8=to use a kexec-hardboot enabled kernel In Primary ROM}

listitem.name: ... but also ask for confirmation before booting
Ask whether to kexec or use no-kexec on booting

text.text: {@multirom_press_vol_updown=Press and hold volume up or down}
{@multirom_press_vol_updown2=during boot to enter the MultiROM menu.}
{@multirom_injection_failed2=This very likely means your boot.img is now}
{@multirom_injection_failed3=unstable, and the ROM in question may not boot.}
{@multirom_injection_failed4=You should consider reflashing the ROM or at}
{@multirom_injection_failed6=On encrypted devices, this may also mean that on}
"{@multirom_injection_failed7=second boot" multirom may not be able to decrypt your}
{@multirom_injection_failed8=data partition, in which case you should reboot to TWRP}
{@multirom_injection_failed9=and reflash a proper boot.img for the ROM in question.}
{@multirom_disk_images_size=Set up the size of disk images.}
{@multirom_fat32_2=size of the image is limited to 4095MB.}
{@multirom_action_copy=This action will create a copy of your current}
{@multirom_action_cp_rmv_ending=primary ROM and then add it to secondary ROMs.}
{@multirom_choose_name=You can choose name of this new ROM below.}
{@multirom_select_secondary_for_swap=Select secondary ROM to swap primary with.}
{@multirom_select_secondary_for_copy=Select secondary ROM to copy into primary slot.}
